bibl.title: with contributions by Günter DREYER, Peter GROSSMANN, Ulrich HARTUNG, Dietrich RAUE and Ute RUMMEL, Meeting the Past. 100 Years in Egypt. German Archaeological Institute. Cairo 1907-2007. Catalogue of the Special Exhibition in the Egyptian Museum in Cairo, 19th November 2007 to 15th January 2008.
bibl.biblScope: figg. n./bl. et coul., plans, 1 carte coul., pll. n./bl. et coul.
bibl.note: See pp. 1-4: U.R., An Overview of the History of the German Archaeological Institute Cairo; - 132-153: P.Gr., Abu Mina. The Largest Early Christian Pilgrimage Site in the Antique World. - Version anglaise de: Begegnung mit der Vergangenheit. 100 Jahre in Ägypten. Deutsches Archäologisches Institut Kairo 1907-2007. Katalog zur Sonderausstellung im Ägyptischen Museum in Kairo, 19. November 2007 bis 15. Januar 2008 (Kairo, 2007).
